channel.title: CVE Feed for Quantum Cloud -- Slider Hero
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Quantum Cloud -- Slider Hero

item.title: CVE-2024-29922|2024-03-27T07:19:04.502Z -- quantum%20cloud -- slider%20hero
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Quantum Cloud Slider Hero allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Slider Hero: from n/a through 8.6.1.
